rules_text: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control. Those creatures gain decayed. [i](It can't block. When it attacks, sacrifice it at end of combat.)[/i]
flavor_text:
[i]“She be a prize of battle, but she be one with quite a few holes in ‘er. May ‘er last night on the Seas be as glorious as ‘er hand-carved figurehead.”
—Captain Ellison Crain[/i]
